    • getConfig

      public org.bukkit.configuration.file.FileConfiguration getConfig(String fileName)
      Get a configuration file of a player. If the file doesn't exist, it will be created with the default file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the file to get with the extension
      Returns:
      The FileConfiguration object of the file passed in parameter
      null if the file is a directory or if no default file is found
